summary.name: Kodak Disposable Camera Manifest
summary.description: Created by Nathan Stefani. This manifest looks into the supply chain of Kodak Disposable cameras. Through various research, I was able to find manufacturers and suppliers who play a part in the overall Kodak supply chain.

overview.name: Polyester Film
overview.description: Flexible high-quality polyester film for consumer and inudustrial applications. Manufactured in Eastman Businness Park, the 1,200-acre technology and industrial campus primarily owned and operated by Kodak.

location.address: 343 State Street, Rochester, NY 14650-0224.

overview.name: Kodak Ultra Max 400 Film
overview.description: Optimized color precision technology provided consistenly bright, vibrant colors with accurate skin-tone reproduction for natural-looking pictures. Product is manufactured by Sino Promise Group, a supplier and partner of Eastman Kodak and Kodak Alaris. The factory is located in Hong Kong, China.

location.address: Waylee Industrial Centre 30-38 Tsuen King Circuit, Tsuen King Circuit, Hong Kong, China

overview.name: Kodak Printing Paper
overview.description: High-quality, resin-coated, photographic-grade base material. Product is manufactured by Sino Promise Group, a supplier and partner of Eastman Kodak and Kodak Alaris. The factory is located in Hong Kong, China.

location.address: Waylee Industrial Centre 30-38 Tsuen King Circuit, Tsuen King Circuit, Hong Kong, China

overview.name: Kodak Film Camera M35
overview.description: Kodak reusable film camera. Same elements as a Kodak dispsable camera. Product is manufactured by Sino Promise Group, a supplier and partner of Eastman Kodak and Kodak Alaris. The factory is located in Hong Kong, China.

location.address: Waylee Industrial Centre 30-38 Tsuen King Circuit, Tsuen King Circuit, Hong Kong, China

overview.name: ABS Plastic
overview.description: Plastic used for most of the frame. Plastic is provided through numerous suppliers like Chang Chun Plastics/Petrochemicals.

location.address: No 301 Songkiang Road 7Th Fl Taipei 10483 Taiwan

overview.name: AA Alkaline Battery
overview.description: Regular AA Alkaline Battery supplied by Guangzhou Achiever Industrial.

location.address: Hongxing Building, Jinxiu Road, Economic and Technology Development Area e Guangzhou, Guangdong, 510730 China

overview.name: Film Cartridge/ Cannister
overview.description: Cannister that holds the film safely in the camera. Manufactured in Eastman Businness Park, the 1,200-acre technology and industrial campus primarily owned and operated by Kodak.

location.address: Rochester, New York

overview.name: ACA Pacific - Product Distribution
overview.description: ACA distributes many Kodak Alaris products throughout the Pacific.

location.address: 435 Williamstown, Rd U 7, Port Melbourne, Victoria, 3207, Australia

overview.name: PMMA (polymethyl methacrylate)
overview.description: The camera optics, photo lens and viewing lense, are made out of plastic. Lenses are manufactured and supplied by company such as Sichuan JUKA Optical Technology Co.

location.address: No 18. Taixing Avenue, Economic Development Zone, Dujiangyan City

overview.name: Rolled Aluminium
overview.description: Some of the film cannisters made by the Kodak company are made with aluminum which helps reduce the exposure which could endanger the film. Bridgnorth Aluminium supplies some of the Aluminium for Kodak cannisters.

location.address: Stourbridge Road, Bridgenorth, Shropshire, WV15 6AU, UK

overview.name: TAC Film
overview.description: Triacetate Films are noted for the wide range and versatility of their chemical and physical properties. IPI GmbH's TAC films offer advantageous physical and chemical properties, making them far superior to other types of films. Island Polymer Industries is a leader in Cellulose Triacetate Film Production. Headquartered in Wolfen, Germany, IPI GmbH produces high quality films that are sold globally to a wide industry spectrum, including the LCD, Optical Lense, and Photographic Film markets.

location.address: Andresenstr. 6 , ChemiePark, 06766 Bitterfeld-Wolfen, Germany

overview.name: Kodak Electronic Products Shanghai
overview.description: Kodak Electronic Products Shanghai Co. Ltd. manufactures and distributes photographic equipment. The Company produces cameras, camera lenses, and other photographic products. Kodak Electronic Products Shanghai also provide related photography services.

location.address:
1510 Chuanqiao Road, Area A, 2/F, Building 6, Pudong District
Shanghai

overview.name: Film Processing Machinery
overview.description: In order to process and develop films inside disposable cameras, machinery is provided by companies such as Photomec London. Established in 1946, Photomec is the international market leader in the design and manufacture of film processing systems, film cleaners, film scanners, film viewer& film rewinders.

location.address: 156 St Albans Road, Kings Lane, Hertfordshire, Swindon, AL4 9LP

overview.name: Acetic Acid Solution
overview.description: After development, it is recommended to rinse films and papers in an acid stop bath. This Acedic Solution sold by Kodak is used by photographers to help reduce the chances of damaging film. The solution is used by Kodak to process and develop disposable film for consumers

location.address: Schuetzenwall 31-35 Schuetzenwall 31-35 22844 Norderstedt, Germany

overview.name: Circuitry
overview.description: The circuitry needed for the flash circuit is partly provided by Taiwanese Company Lite-On Electronics. Lite-ON is a world-leading provider of opto-semiconductor, power supply management and key electronic products with global manufacturing facilities.

location.address: Rd Guangzhou Science Park Luogang District, Guangzhou, China

overview.name: UK Retailer
overview.description: Kodak Limited is the photographic products provider's oldest overseas subsidiary. It operates manufacturing facilities in England that make photographic and synthetic chemicals, as well as photographic films and papers. The company markets Kodak's full range of offerings, including consumer and professional photographic supplies, imaging products for health and graphic applications, audiovisual systems, and copier products. Kodak Limited's roots reach back to 1885, when Eastman Kodak set up its first British office.

location.address: Croxley Green Business Park Building 8, Hatters Lane Watford Herts, United Kingdom

overview.name: Japan Distributor
overview.description: Kodak Japan Ltd. was founded in 1986. The company's line of business includes the wholesale distribution of photographic equipment and supplies.

location.address: 2-27-1 Shinkawa Chuo-ku Tokyo, 104-0033 Japan

overview.name: New York Retailer
overview.description: B&H Photo Video is an American photo and video equipment retailer founded in 1973, based in Manhattan, New York City. B&H conducts business primarily through online e-commerce consumer sales and business to business sales, as they only have one retail location. B&H is an authorized Kodak dealer and wholesaler. It is the only one (apart from chain establishments such as Walmart, CVS or Walgreens) in the Manhattan area.

location.address: 420 9th Ave, New York, NY 10001 U.S.A

overview.name: Los Angeles Retailer
overview.description: Cinestill Film a Los Angeles based selling film for analog cameras from repacked or respooled Kodak motion picture cinema film stock. The two brothers who founded the company started with hacking cameras and lenses, then moved on to selling film. CineStill started selling film in 2012, that were bought directly from Kodak and respooled into 35mm and 120 film cartridges. Cinestill is an authorized dealer and wholesaler of all sorts of Kodak products.

location.address: 1300 N. Wilton Pl, Los Angeles, California U.S.A

overview.name: Roberts Distributors LP
overview.description: Roberts Distributors is a family owned and operated retail and distribution business located in Indianapolis, Indiana. Roberts Distributors is a major US distributor for all the best brands in analog photography including ILFORD Photo, Kodak, Cinestill, and many more.

location.address: 220 E St Clair St, Indianapolis, IN 46204, USA

overview.name: Walmart Supercenter - New Jersey
overview.description: Walmart is one of the numerous massive chains of retailer that sell Kodak disposable cameras. Some Walmart locations also take part in the closed loop supply chain as they will take back the disposable camera, develop the photos through third party photo labs and recycle the camera.

location.address: 174 Passaic St, Garfield, NJ 07026 USA

overview.name: Forever 21
overview.description: Back in 2018, Kodak and fashion retailer Forever 21 teamed up on an apparel collection featuring some of Kodak's many logos and designs from the Kodak brand's storied history. I thought this entry would be relevant because it shows how Kodak tries to attract the youth with hip clothes after seeing the rise in popularity of film products.

location.address: 343 State Street, Rochester, New York, USA
